title: Cold War in a Country Garden
description: The garden was seven miles long. A puddle was a lake... a shower of rain a flood. Flowers were giant trees. Ants, centipedes, wasps were deadly predators.Matthew Dilke and his platoon were less than a quarter of an inch high, pioneers in a daring experiment to solve the problem that could destroy humanity.Then came the summonsâ€”and Dilke was sent on a mission... to the heart of Eastern Europe.
author: Lindsay Gutteridge
